      • map

        public static <K,V> java.util.Map<K,V> map(K[] keys,
                                           V[] values)
        Create a typed map of key/value pairs.
        Parameters:
        keys - an array of keys. This may not be null and must have the same number of elements as the given values array.
        values - an array of values. This may not be null and must have the same number of elements as the given keys array.
        Returns:
        a strongly typed map of key/value pairs.
